nodes.text: Heptooine was a planet located in the south quadrant of the galaxy. During the Kymoodon Era, areas of space grew around Heptooine, as well as Aplooine, Mantooine and Sestooine.

Heptooine was considered one of the oldest relics of colonization into the Grumani sector by the Galactic Republic. For millennia, it existed as a frontier outpost until a sizable population grew into the surrounding regions of the sector. By the time of Sith control, it had reverted to barbarism after several decades of famine and war.
